doc.field: Topics in alphabetical order: Academy of Music, Advertisements, Autograph album, Banks, Brooklyn Bridge, Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Institute, Brooklyn Theatre victims at Greenwood, Buildings, Columbia Heights, Coney Island, Draft Riots, East River ice, Fires, Friends (Society of), Friends Cemetery, Gas Lighting, Greenwood Cemetery, Irishtown, Judges, Manhattan Beach, Mayors, Monuments, Monument to Lafayette, Orchards, Otton family, Plymouth [Church], Politicians, Ponds, Pratt Institute, Pumps, Revolutionary War, Rollerskating, Sanitary Fair, Schools, Singers, St. John's Church (Fort Hamilton), Streets, Telephones, Temperance, Theatres, Transportation, Waterfront, Williamsburg, Yacht Clubs and Yachting. The subject topics are followed by individuals listed by surname: Abbott, Dr. Lyman; Beecher, Henry Ward; Conway, Lillian; Cragin, Mrs. E.S.; Fancher, Mollie; Kidd, Captain; MacFarland, Daniel; McLean, Andrew; MacMonnies, Frederick; Mosher, Dr. Eliza; Storrs, Rev. Richard Salter; Stranahan, J.S.T.; Talmage, T. De Witt.
